meanings.definition: An overwhelming majority or victory in a competition or election.
meanings.sent1: The team won the game with a landslid.
meanings.sent2: The landslid in the election was unexpected.
meanings.sent3: The landslid victory made everyone cheer.
meanings.sent4: Her landslid win was like a tidal wave of success.
meanings.sent5: The landslid was so huge, it shook the entire town.

meanings.definition: The downward movement of a mass of earth or rock on a slope.
meanings.sent1: After heavy rain, a landslid blocked the road.
meanings.sent2: The geologist studied the aftermath of the landslid.
meanings.sent3: The landslid created a messy situation for the construction crew.
meanings.sent4: The landslid resembled a slow-motion disaster movie.
meanings.sent5: The landslid's force was like a giant hand pushing everything down.
